author: Special Correspondent
text: A large number of devotees and pilgrims witnessed the holy ceremony of flag hoisting marking the commencement of the 459-th kanthuri festival at Nagore Dargah near here on Thursday. Decorated chariots and vehicles carrying the holy flags in the form of ‘Chettipallakku’, ‘ship’, ‘conch’, and ‘minaret’ were taken out in a procession through the thoroughfares in Nagore town. With the illuminated Dargah and other major buildings presenting a visual delight, the devotees marched down through the procession.
title: Flag hoisting at Nagore dargah
